body.name: Apple iPhone 8 64GB Unlocked - Gray
body.merchantInfo: Ships from and sold by Rapid Cell.
features: Preowned - Excellent Condition - Factory Unlocked - Compatible with All service Providers
Minimum 80% Battery Life as compare to a new
Includes Charger and Cable - Packed in Generic Box
Internal Memory: 64GB, 2GB RAM / A11 Bionic Chip with Hexa-Core Processor, iOS, Embedded M11 Motion CoProcessor
12MP with f/1.8 Aperture, Quad-LED True Tone Flash, Hybrid IR Filter & 7MP Front Camera with f/2.2 Aperture, Retina Flash and Auto HDR
Non-Removable 1821 mAh Lithium Ion Battery / 4.7-inch widescreen LCD Multi-Touch Retina HD Display with IPS Technology, 750 x 1334 pixels
body.description: iPhone features a new glass and aluminum design in three beautiful colors made out of the most durable glass ever in a smartphone, Retina HD displays and A11 Bionic chip, and is designed for the ultimate augmented reality experience. “iPhone 8 have new glass and aluminum designs, new Retina HD displays and A11 Bionic — the smartest chip ever in a smartphone. Packed with more advanced cameras with Portrait mode and Portrait Lighting, and the highest quality video capture in a smartphone, iPhone 8 enable the freedom of wireless charging, all with AR optimization like no phone ever before.” iPhone 8 introduce a beautiful glass back design made with the most durable glass ever in a smartphone in three new finishes: space gray, silver and gold. The glass finish is made using a seven-layer color process for precise hue and opacity, delivering a rich depth of color with a color-matched aerospace-grade aluminum bezel, and is water and dust resistant.1 The new 4.7-inchRetina HD displays with the addition of True Tone adjust the white balance of the display to match the surrounding light for a more natural, paper-like viewing experience. The vibrant wide color gamut Retina HD display offers the best color accuracy in the industry. Redesigned stereo speakers are up to 25 percent louder and deliver deeper bass, enabling richer-sounding music, videos and speakerphone calls. A11 Bionic, the most powerful and smartest chip ever in a smartphone, features a six-core CPU design with two performance cores that are 25 percent faster and four efficiency cores that are 70 percent faster than the A10 Fusion, offering industry-leading performance and energy efficiency. A new, second-generation performance controller can harness all six cores simultaneously, delivering up to 70 percent greater performance for multi-threaded workloads, giving customers more power while providing the same great battery life. A11 Bionic also integrates an Apple-designed GPU with a three-core design that delivers up to 30 percent faster graphics performance than the previous generation. All this power enables incredible new machine learning, AR apps and immersive 3D games.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 3.6 3.6 out of 5 stars 29 ratings 3.6 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Came with working undamaged cellphone and charger and charging block. Worked with the micro SIM card I got from the specific phone company I chose to use. Came before Christmas and daughter loves having a her own phone that has a plan on it and everything. Was worried it wouldn’t be an open company phone to where I can use what ever company I want for the plan but everything worked out it’s wonderful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Camera Does Not Work
reviews.reviewText: Ordered 2 of these camera is a black screen for both. Selfie camera is ok. Apparently known problem

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Less expensive than new.
reviews.reviewText: Getting the refurbished phone through Amazon is much less expensive than buying a whole new one. And by getting it through Amazon I know I can trust I’m not being scammed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great deal on a good iphone. Who needs to spend 1500 dollar bucks on a new one every year?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good purchase
reviews.reviewText: The delivery was much earlier than expected. I am very happy with the product, it works very well. It met my expectations.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love it I was a gift for my grandson very good quality no problems at all recommend
